verses.verse: All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%> shall ye <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> ye may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>led<s%> thee <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H4616>to<s%> <S%H6031>humble<s%> thee, and to <S%H5254>prove<s%> thee, to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>what<s%> was in thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> whether thou wouldest <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And he <S%H6031>humbled<s%> thee, and suffered thee to <S%H7456>hunger,<s%> and <S%H398>fed<s%> thee <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H4478>manna,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H3045>knewest<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3045>know;<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> he might make thee <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> doth <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H905>only,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> word that proceedeth <S%H4161>out<s%> of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> doth <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2421>live.<s%>

Thy <S%H8071>raiment<s%> waxed not <S%H1086>old<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H4480>upon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee, <S%H3808>neither<s%> did thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H1216>swell,<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

Thou shalt also <S%H3045>consider<s%> <S%H5973>in<s%> thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H3588>that,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3256>chasteneth<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> so the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3256>chasteneth<s%> thee.

Therefore thou shalt <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and to <S%H3372>fear<s%> him.

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>bringeth<s%> thee <S%H413>into<s%> a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> of <S%H5869>fountains<s%> and <S%H8415>depths<s%> that spring <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H1237>valleys<s%> and <S%H2022>hills;<s%>

A <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> and <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and <S%H1612>vines,<s%> and fig <S%H8384>trees,<s%> and <S%H7416>pomegranates;<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2132>olive,<s%> and <S%H1706>honey;<s%>

A <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H4544>scarceness,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2637>lack<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> thing in it; a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> are <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and out of whose <S%H4480>hills<s%> <S%H2042><s%> thou mayest <S%H2672>dig<s%> <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

When thou hast <S%H398>eaten<s%> and art <S%H7646>full,<s%> then thou shalt <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> thee.

Beware <S%H8104><s%> that thou forget <S%H6435>not<s%> <S%H7911><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> in <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H8104>keeping<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and his <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and his <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this day: <S%H3117><s%>
Lest <S%H6435><s%> when thou hast <S%H398>eaten<s%> and art <S%H7646>full,<s%> and hast <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein;

And when thy <S%H1241>herds<s%> and thy <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H7235>multiply,<s%> and thy <S%H3701>silver<s%> and thy <S%H2091>gold<s%> is <S%H7235>multiplied,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast is <S%H7235>multiplied;<s%>

Then thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> be lifted <S%H7311>up,<s%> and thou <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> which brought thee <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H5650>bondage;<s%>

Who <S%H1980>led<s%> thee through that <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> wherein were <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H5175>serpents,<s%> and <S%H6137>scorpions,<s%> and <S%H6774>drought,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4325>water;<s%> who brought thee <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H4480>rock<s%> <S%H6697><s%> of <S%H2496>flint;<s%>

Who <S%H398>fed<s%> thee in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> with <S%H4478>manna,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> he might <S%H6031>humble<s%> thee, and <S%H4616>that<s%> he might <S%H5254>prove<s%> thee, to do thee <S%H3190>good<s%> at thy latter <S%H319>end;<s%>

And thou <S%H559>say<s%> in thine <S%H3824>heart,<s%> My <S%H3581>power<s%> and the <S%H6108>might<s%> of mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> hath <S%H6213>gotten<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2428>wealth.<s%>

But thou shalt <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it is <S%H1931>he<s%> that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee <S%H3581>power<s%> to <S%H6213>get<s%> <S%H2428>wealth,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> he may <S%H6965>establish<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thou do at all <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H7911><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> them, and <S%H7812>worship<s%> them, I <S%H5749>testify<s%> against you this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> ye shall surely <S%H6>perish.<s%> <S%H6><s%>

As the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6>destroyeth<s%> before your <S%H4480>face,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall ye <S%H6>perish;<s%> <S%H6118>because<s%> ye would <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H8085>obedient<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
